Issue.creator: btl5037
Issue.description: Go 1.12 will go EOL shortly, we need to cross the barrier into 1.13. There are some changes related to SSL and error handling that will need to be backported into 1.4 to make it work, you should be able to look at the commit history in the time around when we crossed the barrier in 2.0 and see what changes need to be backported (in general they were trivial changes, but they need to be made).
